DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether pressure control ventilation reduce gastric insufflation compare volume control ventilation patient mechanically ventilate i-gel .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Effect Pressure-controlled Ventilation Volume-controlled Ventilation Gastric Insufflations I-gel
